    Package and Description
    org.robolectric.shadows.httpclient
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.robolectric.util.AccessibilityUtil
    Use AccessibilityUtil instead.
    org.robolectric.util.ActivityController
    Use ActivityController instead. This will be removed in a forthcoming release.
    org.robolectric.util.ApplicationTestUtil
    Use ApplicationTestUtil instead.
    org.robolectric.util.ContentProviderController
    Use ContentProviderController instead. This will be removed in a forthcoming release.
    org.robolectric.res.builder.DefaultPackageManager
    use @{link ShadowPackageManager} instead.
    org.robolectric.util.FragmentController
    Use FragmentController instead. This will be removed in a forthcoming release.
    org.robolectric.util.FragmentTestUtil
    Please use Robolectric.buildFragment(Class) instead. This will be removed in a forthcoming release,
    org.robolectric.util.IntentServiceController
    Use IntentServiceController instead. This will be removed in a forthcoming release.
    org.robolectric.util.concurrent.RoboExecutorService
    Use RoboExecutorService instead.
    org.robolectric.util.ServiceController
    Use ServiceController instead. This will be removed in a forthcoming release.
    org.robolectric.internal.Shadow
    Use Shadow instead. This will be removed in a forthcoming release.
    org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowConfiguration
    This will be removed in Robolectric 3.4 - Configuration is pure Java so there is no need for a shadow to exist. The methods have been preserved but marked deprecated to prevent build breakages but in this version implementation has been modified to simply call through to the Framework code which may in some cases cause test failures due to the way the shadow diverged in behaviour from the Framework code. Some notes have been added to help you migrate in these cases. Some notes to help you migrate:-
    1. ShadowConfiguration.setLocale(java.util.Locale) only exists in API 17+ so calling this on earlier APIs will fail with NoSuchMethodException
    2. ShadowConfiguration.setToDefaults() overrides the frameworks natural defaults to set the flags for Configuration.screenLayout to include Configuration.SCREENLAYOUT_LONG_NO and Configuration.SCREENLAYOUT_SIZE_NORMAL
    3. ShadowConfiguration.overrideQualifiers(java.lang.String) and ShadowConfiguration.getQualifiers() have no effect and can be removed.
    org.robolectric.internal.ShadowExtractor
    Use Shadow.extract(Object) instead.
    org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowHandler
    There is no special shadow implementation for the Handler class. The special handling is all done by ShadowLooper and ShadowMessageQueue. This class has been retained for backward compatibility with the various static method implementations.
    org.robolectric.res.builder.StubPackageManager
    Use ShadowPackageManager instead. 
       ShadowPackageManager shadowPackageManager = shadowOf(context.getPackageManager());
    If there is functionality you are missing you can extend ShadowPackageManager.
    org.robolectric.android.StubPackageManager
    Use ShadowPackageManager instead. 
       ShadowPackageManager shadowPackageManager = shadowOf(context.getPackageManager());
    If there is functionality you are missing you can extend ShadowPackageManager.
    org.robolectric.util.Transcript
    This class will be removed in a forthcoming release.
    org.robolectric.res.builder.XmlResourceParserImpl
    Use XmlResourceParserImpl instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.robolectric.util.Transcript.add(String)
    This class will be removed in a forthcoming release.
    org.robolectric.shadows.httpclient.FakeHttp.addPendingHttpResponseWithContentType(int, String, Header)
    use FakeHttp.addPendingHttpResponse(int, String, org.apache.http.Header...) instead
    org.robolectric.util.Scheduler.advanceBy(long)
    Use Scheduler.advanceBy(long, TimeUnit).
    org.robolectric.util.Transcript.assertEventsInclude(String...)
    This class will be removed in a forthcoming release.
    org.robolectric.util.Transcript.assertEventsSoFar(String...)
    This class will be removed in a forthcoming release.
    org.robolectric.util.Transcript.assertNoEventsSoFar()
    This class will be removed in a forthcoming release.
    org.robolectric.android.controller.ActivityController.attach()
    This is a no-op, it's safe to remove this call. This method will be removed in Robolectric 3.4.
    org.robolectric.android.controller.ComponentController.attach()
    The component is automatically attached. There is no need to call this method. TODO(jongerrish): Make this method private so that it can only be called internally, should not be part of the API. This method will be removed in Robolectric 3.4.
    org.robolectric.android.controller.FragmentController.attach()
    This is a no-op, it's safe to remove this call. This method will be removed in Robolectric 3.4.
    org.robolectric.android.controller.IntentServiceController.attach()
    This is a no-op, it's safe to remove this call. This method will be removed in Robolectric 3.4.
    org.robolectric.android.controller.ServiceController.attach()
    This is a no-op, it's safe to remove this call. This method will be removed in Robolectric 3.4.
    org.robolectric.shadows.support.v4.SupportFragmentController.attach()
    This is a no-op, it's safe to remove this call. This method will be removed in Robolectric 3.4.
    org.robolectric.util.Transcript.clear()
    This class will be removed in a forthcoming release.
    org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowTelecomManager.clearAccounts() 
    org.robolectric.RobolectricTestRunner.createClassLoaderConfig(Config)
    Override RobolectricTestRunner.createClassLoaderConfig(FrameworkMethod) instead
    org.robolectric.internal.ShadowExtractor.extract(Object)
    Use Shadow.extract(Object) instead.
    org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowHandler.flush()
    use ShadowLooper.idleMainLooper() instead
    org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowAccountManager.get(Context)
    This method will be removed in Robolectric 3.4 Use AccountManager.get(Context) instead.
    org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowView.getBackgroundColor()
    Use FEST assertions instead.
    org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowView.getBackgroundResourceId()
    Use FEST assertions instead.
    org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowBitmapDrawable.getCreatedFromResId()
    use ShadowBitmap#getCreatedFromResId() instead.
    org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowTelecomManager.getDefaultPhoneApp() 
    org.robolectric.util.Transcript.getEvents()
    This class will be removed in a forthcoming release.
    org.robolectric.shadows.maps.ShadowGeoPoint.getLat()
    Use ShadowGeoPoint.getLatitudeE6()
    org.robolectric.shadows.maps.ShadowGeoPoint.getLng()
    Use ShadowGeoPoint.getLongitudeE6().
    org.robolectric.RuntimeEnvironment.getPackageManager()
    Prefer Android API Context.getPackageManager() instead.
    org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowConfiguration.getQualifiers()
    Use RuntimeEnvironment.getQualifiers() although there should be no reason to obtain this since it is typically set in tests through Config.qualifiers() so you should use a constant in these cases.
    org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowView.getQualifiers() 
    org.robolectric.RuntimeEnvironment.getRobolectricPackageManager()
    Use ShadowPackageManager instead. 
       ShadowPackageManager shadowPackageManager = shadowOf(context.getPackageManager());
    org.robolectric.shadows.httpclient.ShadowDefaultRequestDirector.getSentHttpRequest(int)
    Use FakeHttp.getSentHttpRequestInfo(int) instead.)
    org.robolectric.shadows.httpclient.ShadowDefaultRequestDirector.getSentHttpRequestInfo(int)
    Use FakeHttp.getSentHttpRequest(int) instead.)
    org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowLooper.idle(long)
    Use ShadowLooper.idle(long, TimeUnit).
    org.robolectric.util.Scheduler.idleConstantly(boolean)
    This method is ambiguous in how it should behave when turning off constant idle. Use Scheduler.setIdleState(IdleState) instead to explicitly set the state.
    org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowHandler.idleMainLooper() 
    org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowLooper.idleMainLooper(long)
    Use ShadowLooper.idleMainLooper(long, TimeUnit).
    org.robolectric.util.FragmentController.of(F)
    Use FragmentController.of(Fragment) instead. This will be removed in a forthcoming release.
    org.robolectric.util.FragmentController.of(F, Class<? extends Activity>)
    Use FragmentController.of(Fragment, Class) instead. This will be removed in a forthcoming release.
    org.robolectric.util.FragmentController.of(F, Class<? extends Activity>, Intent)
    Use FragmentController.of(Fragment, Class, Intent) instead. This will be removed in a forthcoming release.
    org.robolectric.util.FragmentController.of(F, Intent)
    Use FragmentController.of(Fragment, Intent) instead. This will be removed in a forthcoming release.
    org.robolectric.util.ActivityController.of(ShadowsAdapter, T)
    Use ActivityController.of(ShadowsAdapter, Activity) instead. This will be removed in a forthcoming release.
    org.robolectric.util.ActivityController.of(ShadowsAdapter, T, Intent)
    Use ActivityController.of(ShadowsAdapter, Activity, Intent) instead. This will be removed in a forthcoming release.
    org.robolectric.util.IntentServiceController.of(ShadowsAdapter, T, Intent)
    Use IntentServiceController.of(ShadowsAdapter, IntentService, Intent) instead. This will be removed in a forthcoming release.
    org.robolectric.util.ServiceController.of(ShadowsAdapter, T, Intent)
    Use ServiceController.of(ShadowsAdapter, Service, Intent) instead. This will be removed in a forthcoming release.
    org.robolectric.util.ContentProviderController.of(T)
    Use ContentProviderController.of(ContentProvider) instead. This will be removed in a forthcoming release.
    org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowConfiguration.overrideQualifiers(String)
    org.robolectric.android.AccessibilityUtil.passesAccessibilityChecksIfEnabled(View)
    org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowLooper.post(Runnable, long)
    Use a Handler instance to post to a looper.
    org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowLooper.postAtFrontOfQueue(Runnable)
    Use a Handler instance to post to a looper.
    org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowAppWidgetManager.putWidgetInfo(int, AppWidgetProviderInfo)
    org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowHandler.runMainLooperOneTask() 
    org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowHandler.runMainLooperToEndOfTasks() 
    org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowHandler.runMainLooperToNextTask() 
    org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowConfiguration.setLocale(Locale)
    org.robolectric.manifest.AndroidManifest.setPackageName(String)
    org.robolectric.RuntimeEnvironment.setRobolectricPackageManager(RobolectricPackageManager)
    Use ShadowPackageManager instead. 
       ShadowPackageManager shadowPackageManager = shadowOf(context.getPackageManager());
    If there is functionality you are missing you can extend ShadowPackageManager.
    org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowApplication.setSystemService(String, Object)
    Do not depend on this method to override services as it will be removed in a future update. The preferered method is use the shadow of the corresponding service.
    org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowConfiguration.setTo(Configuration)
    org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowConfiguration.setToDefaults()
    org.robolectric.Shadows.shadowOf(Configuration)
    org.robolectric.Shadows.shadowOf(Handler)
    org.robolectric.RobolectricTestRunner.shouldIgnore(FrameworkMethod, Config)
    Override RobolectricTestRunner.shouldIgnore(FrameworkMethod) instead.
    org.robolectric.android.controller.ActivityController.withIntent(Intent)
    Use Robolectric.buildActivity(Class, Intent) instead. This method will be removed in Robolectric 3.4.
    org.robolectric.android.controller.ComponentController.withIntent(Intent)
    Use the appropriate builder in Robolectric instead. This method will be removed in Robolectric 3.4.
    org.robolectric.android.controller.FragmentController.withIntent(Intent)
    Use Robolectric.buildFragment(Class, Class, Intent) instead. This method will be removed in Robolectric 3.4.
    org.robolectric.shadows.support.v4.SupportFragmentController.withIntent(Intent)
    Use SupportFragmentController.of(Fragment, Class, Intent) instead. This method will be removed in Robolectric 3.4.
